      • getIntermedeateColor

        static java.awt.Color getIntermedeateColor(double ratio,
                                           java.awt.Color c0,
                                           java.awt.Color c1)
        Get an intermediate color between two colors Super simple cross-fade in RGB space with no regard for HSV or any actual science on how colors work.
        Parameters:
        ratio - 0 is full c0, 1 is full c1
        c0 - one color
        c1 - the other color
        Returns:
        an intermediate color
